Described Disease.Described Disease: Mitochondrial Encephalopathy, Lactic Acidosis, and Stroke-like episodes (MELAS)

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using a HeLa cell line that expresses mitochondrial proteins.

Readout description.Result Description: The expression of the Ala264Val variant in MT-ATP6 protein was reduced by 50%.
The expression of the Ala116Val variant in MT-ATP8 protein was reduced by 30%.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA for each gene was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.
